3D打印的类脑样模型有助于解锁神经元的生长秘密大脑中的关键细胞通过交换信号，使大脑能够以惊人的速度学习和适应网络。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/3D-printed-brain-like-model-model-helps-unlock-neyron-neuron-growth-secrets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/3d-printed-brain-like-model-model-helps-unlock-nocl-neuron-growth-secrets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d285da6-f3f5-4fe6-9bd4-a80621E37A3E Fri, 31 Jan 2025 01:08:42 -0500 3D-printed brain-like model helps unlock neuron growth secrets
Integra Biosciences的试剂分配器现在支持Sila-2集成Integra Biosciences的WellJet试剂分配器现在支持基于实验室自动化的Sila-2标准通信协议的API命令。这种新的功能将使将井泽特集成到自动化实验室工作流程中变得更加容易，从而帮助实验室提高其生产力和可重复性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/integra-biosciences-reagent-dispenser-now-now-supports-now-supports-sila-2-integration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/integra-biosciences-reagent-dispenser-now-now-supports-sila-2-inclegration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0132B585-1A4C-41F0-9086-ECB47991D65A Thu, 30 Jan 2025 22:52:00 -0500 INTEGRA Biosciences' reagent dispenser now supports SiLA-2 integration
频繁的社交参与可能会延迟痴呆发作根据拉什（Rush）进行的研究，拜访朋友，参加聚会并参加教堂可能会帮助保持大脑的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/frequent-social-engagement-may-delay-delay-dementia-onset.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/frequent-social-engegement-may-delay-delay-dementia-ontet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00085b3f-d150-492f-a0d9-ef47b90308fa Thu, 30 Jan 2025 22:05:36 -0500 Frequent social engagement may delay dementia onset
新的研究旨在提高人们对上神经切开力学的理解每年分娩期间数以百万计的妇女在分娩期间经历了伴奏，但是这些手术切割背后的机制在很大程度上仍未被研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/new-research-aims-to-improve-undrove-underding-of-episiotomy-mechanics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/new-research-aims-to-improve-underve---episiotomy-mechanics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb75cf6e-8c57-4671-8BE4-938E2C121E05 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 22:05:16 -0500 New research aims to improve understanding of episiotomy mechanics
抗体疗法可保护猴子中严重的H5N1禽流感一种预防性抗体的免疫疗法可保护猴子免受H5N1禽流感，匹兹堡大学和NIH疫苗研究中心研究人员的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/antibody-therapy-provides-protection-protection-against-severe-h5n1-avian-flu-in-runkeys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/antibody-therapy-provides-protection-protection-against-severe-h5n1-avian-flu-in-inkeys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8B475473-FA71-49BD-972A-A0A73BE90D9D Thu, 30 Jan 2025 21:58:20 -0500 Antibody therapy provides protection against severe H5N1 avian flu in monkeys
抓挠既加重炎症又增强免疫防御措施新的研究发现了挠痒痒的双重性质；尽管它会使皮肤炎症恶化，但它也可以增强免疫防御措施，以抵抗损伤部位的细菌感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/scratching-found-to-to-to-both-aggravate-inflammation-and-boost-boost-immune-defenses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/scratching-found-to-to-both-aggravate-inflammation-ind-boost-boost-immune-defenses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d405737-7406-4d74-bed1-8EE50AADC9A5 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 21:54:33 -0500 Scratching found to both aggravate inflammation and boost immune defenses
psilocybin通过改变神经熵来促进持久的信念变化psilocybin在给药后四个星期显着降低了对负面自信的信心，其影响与统一的经验和神经熵有关，这表明有潜在的长期认知重组途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/psilocybin-promotes-lasting-belief-change-change-change-by-altering-antering-nearring-neuring-nator-entropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/psilocybin-promotes-lasting-belief-change-change-change-by-altering-natering-neuring-neuring-neur--------entropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4A424636-D7A3-4C64-ADB9-05F4BBDDBFF2 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 21:52:00 -0500 Psilocybin promotes lasting belief change by altering neural entropy
更好的睡眠卫生可以改善FIFO工人的健康伊迪丝·考恩大学（ECU）的新研究表明，更好的睡眠卫生可以看到飞入，挖掘（FIFO）矿业转变工人的夜晚睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/better-sleep-hygiene-can-improve-health-for-for-for-fifo-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/better-sleep-hygiene-can-improve-health-health-for-for-fifo-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=700A1F3C-289B-4E70-BB4D-705DDD41ABD0F Thu, 30 Jan 2025 21:51:59 -0500 Better sleep hygiene can improve health for FIFO workers
激素标记可能会导致产后抑郁症的早期发现根据Weill Cornell医学研究人员的一项新研究，继续发展产后抑郁症（PPD）的女性可能具有特征性的神经活性类固醇水平，源自激素孕激素的分子，在怀孕的第三个月中。弗吉尼亚医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/hormonal-markers-could-could-lead-to-to-to-------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/hormonal-markers-could-could-could-to-to-read-to-ready-detection-fostpartpartum-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67c9b2fb-fa6f-4D6D-9484-BF70CF05AC1B Thu, 30 Jan 2025 21:46:25 -0500 Hormonal markers could lead to early detection of postpartum depression
较长的护理时间与女性更年期症状有关研究人员已经确定了女性表现的每周护理小时数量与更年期症状负担之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/longer-caregiving-hours-inied-to-worse-menopause-symptoms-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/longer-caregiving-hours-tied-to-worse-menopause-symptoms-ind-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08151068-A99A-4917-A54A-17235F6D5641 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 21:38:00 -0500 Longer caregiving hours tied to worse menopause symptoms in women
